note: I'm a musician, tech-enthusiast, & also enjoy good people & good food. Nature, reading, meditation/spiritual growth, cooking, laughing, & savoring life & the connections I have with others are among those things I hold dear. Started playing the piano at age 3 & vocal later (harp even later). Computers came along at age 6; went from Apple, to DOS, to Windows, around to Linux, & back to Apple (primarily). Love checking out all tech (access tech, too).
